name: MeiraGTx UK II Ltd
goal: Discussion of potential funding opportunities for gene therapy manufacturing providing a pan european Bio-ecosystem for the Gene Therapy sector
euInitiatives:
MeiraGTx visits Brussels to have meetings with various EU Institutions and agencies and have active funding applications.

MeiraGTx is seeking potential funding to build a gene therapy manufacturing platform providing a pan -european gene therapy bio-ecosystem to deliver inoovative gene therapy products to patients.
